scripts.lambda:deploy: pnpm lambda:build && pnpm lambda:updateCode && pnpm lambda:waitUpdated
scripts.lambda:build: podman build -t silp0 . && container=$(podman create silp0) && (podman cp $container:/app/lambda.zip ./lambda.zip ; podman rm $container)
scripts.lambda:updateCode: AWS_PROFILE=silp0 aws lambda update-function-code --function-name silp0 --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip --query '[]' >/dev/null
scripts.lambda:waitUpdated: AWS_PROFILE=silp0 aws lambda wait function-updated --function-name silp0
